title: USB to Jack not working.
content:
When I put the adapter of  USB type-C to audio jack (3.5mm) , I receve a notification from Android System that say  "Analog audio accessory detected.  The attached device is not compatible with this phone. Tap to learn more." And the sound came out from the front speakers.

Before I had a stereo earphones with USB type-C but that didn't work so now I use the adapter but again don't work.
